@mave99a We love SMTP. Much of the @xmtp_ (soon to be released) Litepaper is a love letter to email.

But put simply, SMTP isn‚Äôt compatible with blockchains. To enable communication as tied to wallets something new has to come along. That‚Äôs our focus!

@arboraeth @annemnemosyne This is something we‚Äôre super cognizant of with building a web3 communication protocol/network in @xmtp_.

Decentralized, permissionless, and verifiable private messaging has so much value to bring. But spam prevention must be a first-class citizen at every level of the stack.
